stimulusHtml: (a) Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the area of R.

features.html:
NO CALCULATOR IS ALLOWED FOR THIS QUESTION.

stimulusHtml: (b) Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

features.html:
NO CALCULATOR IS ALLOWED FOR THIS QUESTION.

stimulusHtml: (c) Region R is the base of a solid whose cross sections perpendicular to the x-axis are semicircles with diameters on the xy-plane. Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the volume of this solid.

features.html:
NO CALCULATOR IS ALLOWED FOR THIS QUESTION.
